reuters.title: SEC SAYS IT LET FIRMS REPURCHASE STOCK UNTIL 4:00, RATHER THAN 3:30, FOR TODAY ONLY
reuters.body: Shr profit five cts vs loss nine cts Net profit 21,045 vs loss 34,238 Revs 1,156,775 vs 963,890 Six Mths Shr profit 12 cts vs loss five cts Net profit 48,711 vs loss 18,300 Revs 2,124,157 vs 2,009,956 Reuter 
